metadata.title: CVE-2023-2156 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the networking subsystem of the Linux kernel within thehandling of the RPL protocol. This issue results from the lack of properhandling of user-supplied data, which can lead to an assertion failure.This may allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to create a denial ofservice condition on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
